title: The Favorites - AFC West Betting Preview with Colin Cowherd
itunes:title: The Favorites - AFC West Betting Preview with Colin Cowherd
description:
Sports media impresario Colin Cowherd swings by the show again for a rousing discussion about the wild AFC West. Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter discuss their favorites picks across a division loaded with quarterback talent, and breakdown their rationale for futures bets. Later, they ask Colin his opinion on the best signalcallers out west, and get his pick for who he thinks takes the division crown. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
